user.title: First time setup
user.description:
Welcome to this integrated plug-in!
Exclusively written and produced by [@knoop7](https://github.com/knoop7)

Reposting on Xiaohongshu, Bilibili and other platforms without permission is prohibited.
All types of commercial and secondary modification-related derivatives are strictly prohibited
If there are any violations, updates and subsequent code maintenance will be stopped.


**Traditional Calendar:**
• Real-time display of traditional lunisolar calendar information
• Accurate forecast of the 24 solar terms
• Daily guidance on good and bad luck and taboos

**Birthday Management:**
• Family member’s birthday
• Related horoscopes and birthday reminder functions

**Event Management:**
• Investment and financial management reminders
• Work schedule reminder
• Meeting and dinner reminders
• Anniversary reminders
